name: Comprehensive Appearance Admin
author: Martin Robbins

sections.description:
Display a better, comprehensive Appearance Menu in the Dashboard and in the front-end Toolbar.

Where they are not present, adds links to the various customizer sections/panels and to the corresponding old-school admin appearance pages.

Tested to WordPress 4.4-alpha1-34565.
sections.installation:
Download the plugin zip file

Upload via dashboard > plugins > add new > upload

Activate the plugin
sections.changelog:
0.1.4

  • Account for the toolbar top-level customize node (new in 4.3)
  • Correct dashboard links to the old-school custom header and custom background admin pages

0.1.3

  • Correct both links directly to the customizer nav_menu panel now that its url has been redefined in 4.3-beta1

0.1.2

  • Add all links explicitly as new instead of CSS-unhiding the existing core links
  • Does not modify any core links
  • Position dashboard old-school links to the bottom of the appearance menu
  • Position toolbar old-school links into a single fly-out menu to the bottom of the appearance menu

0.1.1

  • Added toolbar appearance menu link directly to the menu customizer

0.1.0

  • Original release
